Reference

Package information

MAIC

MAIC: A package for performing matched-adjusted indirect comparisons

Weight estimation

Functions for estimating weights

estimate_weights()

Estimate MAIC propensity weights

Diagnostics

Functions for diagnositics of weights.

estimate_ess()

Estimate effective sample size

hist_wts()

Produce histograms of weights and rescaled weights

profile_wts()

Produce a data frame of the weights assigned to patient profiles

summarize_wts()

Summarize the weight values

wt_diagnostics()

Weight diagnostics

check_weights()

Checking whether optimization has worked

Analysis of MAIC models

Functions for analysing and reporting after weights have been estimated.

bootstrap_HR()

Bootstrapping for MAIC weighted hazard ratios

bootstrap_OR()

Bootstrapping for MAIC weighted odds ratios

bootstrap_HR_anchored()

Bootstrapping for MAIC weighted hazard ratios for anchored comparison

find_RR()

Retrieve relative risk and log relative risk with associated standard error and confidence interval

find_ITC()

Calculate relative risk using indirect treatment comparison (i.e. consistency equation) for anchored comparison

find_SE_fromCI()

Calculate standard error from the reported confidence interval.

Example data

est_weights

est_weights

target_pop_standard

target_pop_standard
